DOC.brief_summary: Healthy volunteer recruit participate ten-week double-blinded crossover trial . The trial consist two , three-week period intermittent fasting , subject receive either antioxidant supplementation placebo , order randomly determine . A one-week preconditioning precede invention period , two week `` wash-out '' period follow first intervention period . Serum-based assay perform assess level reactive oxidant specie , antioxidant gene , sirtuins , marker mitochondrial biogenesis age . The investigator hypothesize intermittent fast diet healthy young volunteer improve marker cellular age beneficial effect abrogate supplementation antioxidant . This study proof-of-principle study shed light mechanism effect IF anti-aging dietary intervention absence weight loss . It inform design dietary intervention effective improve marker age feasible patient practice long-term basis .
DOC.brief_title: Practicality Intermittent Fasting Its Effect Markers Aging Oxidative Stress
DOC.criteria: Body mass index range 20.030.0 kg/m2 ; Age 19 30 ; Stable weight ( change < Â±10 % ) 3 month immediately prior study No history metabolic disorder ( e.g . nondiabetic ) , cardiovascular disease , thyroid dysfunction No past present eat disorder No acute chronic inflammatory disorder No moderate physical activity ( i.e. , < 3 hour/week light exercise session past 3 month ) No current medication regulate blood sugar lipid Not donate blood within 56 day study start date No food allergies No dietary restriction ( e.g . vegetarianism vegan ) No heavy drinking ( 15 drinks/week ) No use tobacco recreational drug within past 3 month Access microwave stove Access refrigeration Inflexibility schedule subject attend blood draw appointment Unwillingness pickup eat studyprovided food 8 week provide unwillingness abstain travel ( > 48hrs ) 8 week trial ( travel permit washout period ) Unwillingness abstain tobacco , alcohol , recreational drug , resveratrol antioxidant supplement ( studyprovided ) duration study Women pregnant , breastfeed try become pregnant
